data.title: Elgin Community College (ECC)
data.meta_description: At Elgin Community College, we commit to student success and empower students to reach their full potential through our dedicated faculty and comprehensive programs.
data.text:
Elgin Community College (ECC) welcomed Gina Ann Garcia, PhD, a leading scholar on Hispanic-Serving Institutions (HSIs), author, and professor at the Berkeley School of Education, to the college’s annual Employee Convocation on Thursday, August 15. The event marked the start of the fall semester, with students returning on August 19.

Elgin Community College and its partners served more than 1,000 students on August 3 through Project Backpack, a community-based initiative to benefit area students in need.

Elgin Community College is celebrating a big milestone this year – 75 years of excellence in teaching and learning. To honor the college’s history and achievements, events and activities are planned yearlong to recognize the many successes of its students, employees, trustees, and community members, who have helped ECC grow and achieve over the years.
